rows.label: qst201506_msg0004
rows.name: These flowers are native to Invidia.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0005
rows.name:
And this particular species
contains a deadly poison.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0006
rows.name:
These flowers... They could be
deadly if used the correct way...

rows.label: qst201506_msg0007
rows.name:
Thanazalea. A flowering shrub
that produces a deadly toxin.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0008
rows.name:
What were you planning
to do with these?

rows.label: qst201506_msg0010
rows.name:
Oh, is that so? Then you won't
mind if I shove some of these
down your gullet then, will you?

rows.label: qst201506_msg0012
rows.name:
We haven't been told the
details. All we were asked to
do is to pick these flowers.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0013
rows.name:
If you wanna know more, you'd
have to ask the other guy.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0014
rows.name:
The other guy? You mean the man
on the outskirts of Fons Maim
hiding away in his little hut?

rows.label: qst201506_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm always watching, dear.
You can't hide your wicked
little scheme from me.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0020
rows.name:
Hahaha... I'll take
that as a compliment.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0017
rows.name:
We have no more need of these two.
It's time we paid the recluse at
Blossomshade Cliff a visit...
